item.title: Floating Point Hell
item.description: This blog post will show how to deal with floating-point error in JavaScript by encoding all uint64’s, and int64’s as strings in JSON Marshaling.

item.title: Setup QEMU for ARM on Wheezy
item.description: This is a quick little blog post for how to install QEMU for ARM on Debian 7.0 (Wheezy).

item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Morgan Creekmore and I work as a Software Engineer doing C#/.NET Development. item.title: Projects
item.description: ginux A research project involving networked Linux VMs at scale. It uses OpenVZ to create 10,000 VMs and incorporates a user-friendly web interface which displays a 3D graph of the network. The web interface includes an xterm terminal allowing access to the currently selected VM in the graph. Github Repository GitHub Repository - QEMU Version MAUL Access control system for managing admins and bans for game servers. It provides an API for game servers to query access levels and ban status of connecting players.
